Sesame
•
A framework for storage, querying and inferencing of RDF and 
RDF Schema

•
Highly expressive query and transformation languages
– SeRQL, SPARQL
•
Various backends
– Native Store
– RDBMS (MySQL, Oracle 10, DB2, PostgreSQL)
– main memory
•
Reasoning support
